title: Strike Witches OVA
synopsis: In 1939, after the world has been devastated by an invasion of the "Neuroi"—alien war machines of unknown origin—humanity continues to struggle in an uneven fight. With no conventional arms able to pierce through the aliens' hardy armor, resistance forces spare no expense in their search for a way to level the playing field.
characters: ['Miyafuji, Yoshika', 'Sakamoto, Mio', 'Bishop, Lynette', 'Clostermann, Perrine H.', 'Wilcke, Minna-Dietlinde', 'Litvyak, Sanya V.', 'Hartmann, Erica', 'Juutilainen, Eila Ilmatar', 'Lucchini, Francesca', 'Barkhorn, Gertrud']
